body.name: HP DeskJet 3772 All-in-One Color Inkjet Printer Scanner and Copy, Instant Ink Ready, Wireless Printers for Home and Office, Photo Print, Built-in WiFi, T8W88A (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 39 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Wireless Printing Options: Enjoy the convenience of wireless printing with Apple AirPrint, HP ePrint, and Wireless Direct Printing, making it easy to print from your mobile devices.
Compact Design: The printer's space-saving design is perfect for small spaces and home use, ensuring it fits wherever you need it.
High-Quality Printing: Achieve impressive print quality with up to 4800 x 1200 optimized dpi in color, ideal for a variety of printing needs.
Speed and Efficiency: With print speeds of up to 8 pages per minute in black and 5.5 pages per minute in color, your printing tasks are completed swiftly.
User-Friendly Features: The printer comes with a 60-sheet input tray, 25-sheet output tray, and Auto Wireless Connect, streamlining your printing experience for increased convenience.
body.description: Introducing the HP DeskJet 3772, the perfect wireless printer for all your home and office needs. This all-in-one printer is designed to provide exceptional performance in a compact and stylish design. With its easy-to-use features, the HP DeskJet 3772 is the ideal choice for those looking for a printer that offers convenience, efficiency, and versatility. Compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, and laptops, this printer is perfect for home use, small offices, or even dorm rooms. With its built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth capabilities, you can effortlessly connect to your devices and print from anywhere in your home or office. The HP DeskJet 3772 is an inkjet printer that delivers high-quality color prints, making it perfect for printing photos, documents, and more. With its all-in-one functionality, this printer also serves as a scanner, copier, and fax machine, ensuring that you have everything you need in one convenient device. Its compact size makes it an ideal choice for small spaces, while its compatibility with various operating systems, including Chrome OS, ensures seamless integration with your existing devices. So, if you're looking for a top-of-the-line printer that offers unbeatable performance, convenience, and affordability, look no further than the HP DeskJet 3772. Get yours today and enjoy the benefits of a truly wireless and versatile printing experience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When something is labeled as "refurbished", I am always wary, but I needed a printer for a Christmas project and I needed one fast. I don't typically use a printer for everyday use, so price point was also a heavily considered factor: I wanted something affordable and practical.The printer works perfectly for printing (haven't tried using it any other way). It was a little tricky to set up but the manual was very helpful. Couldn't figure out the wireless mode, but it worked fine with the provided USB. It does its job and printed beautifully on cardstock for paper crafts. It's nice and compact and easy to store away when not in use. The printer itself is lightweight and doesn't have too many components, so it could also be brought along somewhere if needed without too much hassle.Definitely recommend for someone who doesn't need a printer too often, but would like to have one at home for those unexpected moments. Probably too small and not enough ink for someone who heavily uses a printer (ie - office jobs, work from home, etc.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The printer is wonderful and easy to use, but I am glad it was a replacement for a printer I already had that was the same series and ink cartridges. I had to change the black ink cartridge to one I had here, because it was not usable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME
reviews.reviewText: Wont stay connected to wifi. Wont print fron laptop, it just makes the intial startup noise and the Nothing. The ink that was included was completely dried. Had to go to the library to print return label.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love it but returned it
reviews.reviewText: So I am not a computer wizard but I am also not a boomer. That being said things I would never have thought of made it impossible for the printer to work. I needed this to print off my work computer and the windows version was not supported by this printer. So while I just wanted to plug in the printer to my computer and print, that couldn’t happen (and since it’s a work computer I have to live with what version I have). I was able to connect my phone and print from there no problem though. Came out great, fast. Super easy. I even printed a pic from my phone and it came out awesome. I’m bummed bc it was the perfect printer for what I needed. The scan feature was easy to use too. Perfect size and not a scratch on it. Just double check your computer and system requirements before buying. I wish it worked out because it was real cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Right price, but we haven’t bought renewed printer before. Everything seems fine but we went with an extra 4 year warranty for a nominal amount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars IT'S a OKAY Printer ..
reviews.reviewText: Well i needed another printer that could handle BASIC printing.. just minor things..nothing heavy and for the MONEY its OKAY.. Not BAD 👍. I wouldn't have this for HEAVY printing or business printing. I have a Brother printer that handles heavier jobs . The printing QUALITY is GOOD.... YOU NEED TO KNOW YOUR WI-FI PASSWORD right from the start to SET UP... imo the BIGGEST PROBLEM with this printer is NO INSTRUCTIONS (booklet) included.. you have to GO ONLINE and set up an ACCOUNT (which imo is ALL about you BUYING INK) and follow your way around and YOUR left in the DARK some.... personally I PUSHED buttons and figured it out.... also I made sure I would NOT commit to anything.. Folks 😊 a little instruction booklet would go VERY far to HELP the ease of using and setting up the printer for the whole experience.. anyway, after you figure it out it's OKAY.. I think it goes through INK a little fast.. and from what I'm seeing the INK cartridges are approximately $14 / $15 a piece for generic ink.... The ink cartridge is 65xl- BUT make sure it has the Printer NUMBER listed there 3772.. some say 65 XL with NO 3772 printer listed?? I say this because you know how sometimes the INK cartridges DON'T work when you buy a different brand then HP ink.. anyway 😊 I'm certainly glad I caught it on sale and in my opinion it's NOT a $90/$100 printer and there are others ..but bottom line it's OKAY and it does the job.. Thanks for reading

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was worried about buying a refurbished item. But this is absolutely amazing. Great find thanks Amazon. Great price nice size. Works great
